com.tarena.fly

类 FlyingObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tarena.fly.FlyingObject
  • 直接已知子类:
    Airplane, Bee, Bullet, Hero

    public abstract class FlyingObject
extends java.lang.Object
    飞行物(敌机，蜜蜂，子弹，英雄机)
